content: gracious ghost __________________________________________________________________ difficulty level advanced beginner finished size 3 inches tall 8cm us crochet terms used pattern by craftyellie22 please do not copy share or distribute pattern this pattern is for your personal use only materials 4 mm hook medium weight yarn in white scrap of black yarn for mouth scrap of pink yarn for cheeks soft stuffing / polyester fiber fill black safety eyes - 6mm yarn needle scissors paper & pen optional hole puncher abbreviations chain chain st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch magic_ring magic_ring can be replaced by chain 2 single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet blo back loops only increase 2 single_crochet in the next stitch decrease single_crochet 2 stitches together r row/round fo fasten_off … repeat instructions in parentheses x times tips work tightly and count your stitches use a stitch marker or a piece of yarn to mark beginning of the round crochet through both loops unless stated otherwise crochet in continuous row don t join at the end of each row instructions head & body use white yarn r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r2 increase x 6 12 r3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 r4 2 single_crochet increase x 6 24 r5-10 single_crochet around 24 6 rounds attach eyes between r6-r7 3 st apart embroider a mouth with black yarn and cheeks with pink yarn r11 2 single_crochet increase x 8 32 r12 single_crochet around 32 r13 3 single_crochet increase x 8 40 r14-17 single_crochet around 40 4 rounds r18 blo single_crochet around 40 r19 3 single_crochet decrease x 8 32 r20 2 single_crochet decrease x 8 24 start stuffing r21 single_crochet decrease x 8 16 finish stuffing for a flatter bottom do not stuff the bottom of the body too hard r22 decrease x 8 8 r23 decrease x 2 6 fo & weave in tail wavy bottom you will crochet the next round in the leftover front loops of r18 with the ghost turned upside-down attach yarn to a front-loop to start single_crochet 2 double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch x 8 40 fo & weave in tail arms make 2 r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r2-5 single_crochet around 6 4rounds flatten then 2 single_crochet through both layers fo leave tail for sewing attach arms to body between r11-r13 sign print or handwrite a message such as wishing you a boo tiful day filled with smiles and laughter your smile could light up even the darkest haunted house i admire your spirit it s as enduring as my own you are boo tiful just the way you are cut paper to about 7cm x 3cm punch 2 holes and use yarn to attach to arms
